text: Hi folks! I have a problem where my debuger in VSCode won't stop on breakpoints that i have made. I want to debug some errors originating from a library I'm using, and this would be much easier if the debugger would cooperate. Have anybody had the same issue before?

elements.text: Hi folks! I have a problem where my debuger in VSCode won't stop on breakpoints that i have made. I want to debug some errors originating from a library I'm using, and this would be much easier if the debugger would cooperate. Have anybody had the same issue before?

text: Are you running it in compiled mode or normal one? Does it terminate but not on breakpoints or does it run forever?

elements.text: Are you running it in compiled mode or normal one? Does it terminate but not on breakpoints or does it run forever?
